about_the_game:
Organ Corruption is a First Person Shooter with procedurally generated missions to eliminate corrupted biotech CEOs. You're a bounty hunter hired to do the job. You can choose the way you complete the missions, stealth, violent, augment yourself through organ gathering and crafting using the laboratories.

  • Fast Paced responsive tactical shooting
  • Difficult
  • Remove your own eye
  • Biological weapons
  • Limited Ammunition
  • Life Decisions: sacrifice organs to augment them
  • Multiple routes to solve the missions
  • Secrets
  • Enemies include: Security guards, Doctors, Scientists, Failed Experiments, Drones, Bio Turrets...
  • Don't eat too much

Note: The game is in development and features detailed here are subject to change

name: Organ Corruption

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit and newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHZ+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible 3D Card - Minimum GeForce 460 or equivalent - Integrated graphics (Intel) may not work well and have not been tested. For use with Intel integrated graphics please run the game in DirectX10 compatibility mode.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit and newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHZ+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible 3D Card - Minimum GeForce 460 or equivalent - Integrated graphics (Intel) may not work well and have not been tested. For use with Intel integrated graphics please run the game in DirectX10 compatibility mode.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible card

short_description: Randomized FPS immersive sim where players make their way through offices and labs to eliminate a series of big pharma CEOs. Synthesize ammunition and body modification from the organs of your enemies to become more powerful.
